album.translate: альбом, долгоиграющая пластинка, книга автографов, альбом-пластинка
examples: The album was recorded live.
He just recorded his latest album.
Buy the album, and prepare to be amazed.
He's bringing out a new album next month.
He had just completed his final solo album.
The band plan to release their new album next week.
a special anniversary album of his poetry published 100 years after his death
the title track of the album
I quite like their new album.
a catalog of music album titles
Have a listen to this new album!

The album was sold out within minutes.
They are writing music for a new album.
The album's opener is a slow love song.

The album focuses on themes of love and loss.
The album features Rick Wakeman on keyboards.
Album sales are nudging the one million mark.

They were gaga over the rock group's new album.
The band's new album has had very good reviews.
The credits are listed on the back of the album.
The band will perform songs from their new album.
The album was so-so, but this song is pretty good.
Paul has been knocking out new songs for the album.
The album contains too many songs by marginal bands.
Her first album is scheduled for release in September.
I'd place this album second best after the one of 1996.
Her sophomore album is verging on triple platinum sales.

заглавная композиция этого альбома
